title: Stage Lv3-P3-S15
description: Level 3 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: I wonder when he will come. (variant 1)
I don't know where they are. (variant 1)
learning_points: Level 3 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.en: I wonder when he will come. (variant 1)
I don't know where they are. (variant 1)

sentences.kr: 이 문제를 어떻게 해결할지 생각 중이에요. (확장 1)
sentences.en: I'm thinking about how to solve this problem. (variant 1)

sentences.kr: 그가 올지 안 올지 확실하지 않아요. (확장 1)
sentences.en: I'm not sure if he will come or not. (variant 1)

sentences.kr: 왜 그런 일이 일어났는지 이해할 수 없어요. (확장 1)
sentences.en: I can't understand why that happened. (variant 1)
I want to know who did this. (variant 1)
Please tell me when it will finish. (variant 1)
I don't remember how much it costs. (variant 1)

sentences.kr: 어느 것이 더 좋은지 결정할 수 없어요. (확장 1)
sentences.en: I can't decide which one is better. (variant 1)
I wonder if they can succeed. (variant 1)
I wonder when he will come. (variant 2)
I don't know where they are. (variant 2)
